dynamic_elements.count_query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>

 

SELECT (COUNT(?list) AS ?count)
WHERE
{
?list a owl:Thing .
?list ?relation dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women . 
}
dynamic_elements.count_label: Number of albums by women that sold more than 10mln

dynamic_elements.table_query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> 
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX commons: <http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/>

 


SELECT DISTINCT  ?name ?picture ?birth_date ?place_of_birth ?years_active ?death_date 
WHERE { 
?list a owl:Thing . 
?list ?relation dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women . 
?person a dbo:Animal ; a dbo:Person .
dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women  ?boh ?person .
?person dbp:name ?name .
?person dbo:birthDate ?birth_date .
OPTIONAL { 
?person dbo:deathDate ?death_date .  }
?person dbo:activeYearsStartYear ?years_active .
?person dbp:birthPlace ?place_of_birth . 
?person dbp:name ?name 
MINUS { ?person dbp:name "Whitney Houston"@en } 
?person dbo:thumbnail ?pic .


BIND (REPLACE(str(?pic), "(\\?width=300)", "","i") AS ?picture)
} 
ORDER BY ?years_active

dynamic_elements.map_points_query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> 
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX commons: <http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/>

 

SELECT DISTINCT ?name ?point ?lat ?long
WHERE { 
?list a owl:Thing . 
?list ?relation dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women . 
?person a dbo:Animal ; a dbo:Person .
dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women  ?boh ?person .
?person dbp:name ?name .
?person dbo:birthPlace ?luogo .
?luogo georss:point ?point ; geo:lat ?lat ; geo:long ?long . 
}
GROUP BY ?luogo

dynamic_elements.chart_query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> 
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX commons: <http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?label ?count
WHERE { 
?list a owl:Thing . 
?list ?relation dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women . 
?person a dbo:Animal ; a dbo:Person .
dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women  ?boh ?person .
?person dbp:name ?label .
?person dbp:awards ?what .  
FILTER (REGEX (?what, "awards", "I"))
?what dbp:nominations ?nominations .
?what dbp:wins ?count .
}
GROUP BY ?label
ORDER BY DESC ( ?count)

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> 
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX commons: <http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?label ?count
WHERE { 
?list a owl:Thing . 
?list ?relation dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women . 
?person a dbo:Animal ; a dbo:Person .
dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women  ?boh ?person .
?person dbp:name ?label .
?person dbp:awards ?what .  
FILTER (REGEX (?what, "awards", "I"))
?what dbp:nominations ?count .
?what dbp:wins ?eins .
}
GROUP BY ?label
ORDER BY DESC (?count)

dynamic_elements.textsearch_query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> 
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX commons: <http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?Name ?BirthDate ?years_active
WHERE { 
?list a owl:Thing . 
?list ?relation dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women . 
?person a dbo:Animal ; a dbo:Person .
dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women  ?boh ?person .
?person dbp:name ?Name .
?person dbo:birthDate ?BirthDate .
OPTIONAL { 
?person dbo:deathDate ?datam .  }
?person dbo:activeYearsStartYear ?years_active .
FILTER regex(str(?Name), <<searchterm>>, 'i') 
OPTIONAL { 
?person foaf:homepage ?sito . }
?wikipage  foaf:primaryTopic ?person
 }

dynamic_elements.action_query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> 
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX commons: <http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?wikipage
WHERE { 
?list a owl:Thing . 
?list ?relation dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women . 
?person a dbo:Animal ; a dbo:Person .
dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women  ?boh ?person .
?person dbp:name ?Name .
?person dbo:birthDate ?BirthDate .
OPTIONAL { 
?person dbo:deathDate ?datam .  }
?person dbo:activeYearsStartYear ?years_active .
OPTIONAL { 
?person foaf:homepage ?sito . }
<<item>>  foaf:primaryTopic ?person .
 }
